thread.title: Novak Djokovic thrashes Rafael Nadal to win Open for sixth time
thread.title_full: Novak Djokovic thrashes Rafael Nadal to win China Open for sixth time - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Novak Djokovic thrashes Rafael Nadal to win Open for sixth time
text:
*Beijing:* World No.1 tennis player Novak Djokovic routed Rafael Nadal in straight sets to win his sixth China Open title in Beijinng on Sunday.*Novak Djokovic*
The masterful Serbian handed a 6-2, 6-2 thrashing to the winner of 14 Grand Slam events, who was trying very hard to recover his form after a tough year that saw him ... Â»
